pathAssistantSteps.info:
Basic Information Needed: Account/Dealership, Agreement Signer, Point of Contact for Enrollment Setup, Phone Number, Email.


Visit knowledge base for detail steps on the various types of case tips.

  • Enrollment - Agreement Received

Basic Information Needed: Account/Dealership, Agreement Signer, Point of Contact for Enrollment Setup, Phone Number, Email, Call Tracker Info (if applicable), Ad Source Setup.


Visit knowledge base for detail steps on the various types of case tips.

  • Enrollment - Setup Steps

Basic Information Needed: Account/Dealership, Agreement Signer, Point of Contact for Enrollment Setup, Phone Number, Email, Sales Manager who sold Agreement.


Once you have made multiple attempts contacting the Point of Contact via phone and email, begin contacting the Agreement Signer. After 3 call attempts and 3 email attempts of contacting both the Point of Contact and the Agreement Signer, notify Enrollment Director and escalate account back to Sales Manager who sold Agreement.

Basic Information Needed: Account/Dealership, Agreement Signer, Point of Contact for Enrollment Setup, Phone Number, Email.


Visit knowledge base for details on escalating accounts for review.

  • Enrollment - Review Setup
